tables.description: This information may be found in APP0 of JPEG image data from AVI videos.
The APP14 "Adobe" segment stores image encoding information for DCT filters.
The APP13 "Adobe_CM" segment presumably contains color management information, but the meaning of the data is currently unknown.
APP6 is used in by the Toshiba PDR-M700 to store a TIFF structure containing PrintIM information.
APP15 is used by GraphicConverter to store JPEG quality.
Information extracted from APP11 of a JPEG-HDR image.
Tags found in JPEG Stereo (JPS) images.
This table lists information extracted by ExifTool from JPEG images.
Tags found in the XML metadata of the APP9 "Media Jukebox" segment.
Information in APP6 used by the National Imagery Transmission Format.
Tags extracted from the JPEG APP0 "Ocad" segment (found in Photobucket images).
This information is extracted from the JPEG Start Of Frame segment.
This information is found in APP8 of SPIFF-style JPEG images (the "official" yet rarely used JPEG file format standard: Still Picture Interchange File Format).
